Question
========

An outcome space contains the numbers {1,4,5,7}. Which value should be at the place of the question mark? \

  -------- ----- ----- --- ----- k 1 4 5 7 P(X=k) 1/6 1/6 ?   3/6 -------- ----- ----- --- -----

Answerlist
----------

* 1/6
* 2/6
* 3/6
* 1/4

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 1/6: Correct
* 2/6: Incorrect
* 3/6: Incorrect
* 1/4: Incorrect
